dialogue_turns.text: No, but see, journalists asked why it wasn't strengthening like the ruble. There's a misconception.

dialogue_turns.text: That was part of it! And he said, look, even if sanctions lift and Russia's economy looks good, it won't impact us significantly.

dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, nothing changes for Kazakhstan. Got it. Thanks for the, uh, update.
